page.title: 12SHOPS 2
page.content: {COUNTRY STYLE } Coutry Style is a new shop that's only just opened in Skipsea .They sell small gifts,packs of cards,pencils, fluffy toys,rings,bracelets,books, pens,ribbons and maps.They have brown and fawn carpet tiles on the floor and fawn walls. It smells of herbs. {SKIPSEA SELLING CENTRE Skipsea Selling Centre is full of bric a brac.There are some bikes outside propped up against the window.Before it became a shop,Skipsea Selling Centre was an old farm building.They sell second hand and new goods which people bring for them to sell. {STITCHES Stitches is joined onto Country Style it is a fairly new shop.It sells keyrings and novelties for the tourists,and expensive cuddly toys.It sells wool and knitting needles.
